Documentation: A run of text with a single style.
A scrollable list that works page by page.
A graphic representation of material design's iconography.
A Material Design raised button.
A convenience widget that combines common painting, positioning, and sizing widgets.
Signature: Container({Key? key, Color? color, Decoration? decoration, ...})

Documentation: A floating action button is a circular material design button.
Implements the basic Material Design visual layout structure.
Signature: Scaffold({Key? key, AppBar? appBar, Widget? body, ...})
Example Usage: Scaffold(appBar: AppBar(title: Text('My App')), body: Center(child: Text('Hello, world!')))

Documentation: A Material Design app bar.
Signature: AppBar({Key? key, Widget? title, List<Widget>? actions, ...})

Documentation: A widget that displays an image.
A Material Design flat button.
This class is useful if you want to overlap several children in a simple way.
A widget that detects gestures.
A rectangular area of a Material that responds to touch.
Example Usage: InkWell(onTap: () {}, child: Container(height: 50, width: 50, color: Colors.blue))

Documentation: A widget that clips its child using a rounded rectangle.
A widget that insets its child by the given padding.
Signature: Padding({Key? key, @required EdgeInsetsGeometry padding, Widget? child, ...})

Documentation: Aligns its child within itself and optionally sizes itself based on the child's size.
Signature: Align({Key? key, Alignment alignment = Alignment.center, Widget? child, ...})

Documentation: A widget that displays its children in a horizontal array.
A widget that displays its children in a vertical array.
A widget that expands a child of a Row, Column, or Flex.
Signature: Expanded({Key? key, int flex = 1, @required Widget child})

Documentation: A widget that controls where a child of a Stack is positioned.
Signature: Positioned({Key? key, double? top, double? left, ...})

Documentation: A material design button for selecting from a list of items.
Signature: DropdownButton({Key? key, @required List<DropdownMenuItem<T>> items, T? value, ...})
Example Usage: DropdownButton<String>(items: ['Option 1', 'Option 2'].map((String value) {return DropdownMenuItem<String>(value: value, child: Text(value));}).toList(), onChanged: (_) {}),

Documentation: A Material Design flat button.
A circle that represents a user.
Signature: CircleAvatar({Key? key, Widget? child, Color? backgroundColor, ...})

Documentation: A one logical pixel thick horizontal line, with padding on either side.
Signature: Divider({Key? key, double? height, double? thickness, ...})

Documentation: A Material Design checkbox.
Signature: Checkbox({Key? key, @required bool? value, @required ValueChanged<bool?>? onChanged, ...})

Documentation: A material design text field.
A Material Design slider.
Signature: Slider({Key? key, @required double value, @required ValueChanged<double>? onChanged, ...})

Documentation: A Material Design switch.
Signature: Switch({Key? key, @required bool value, @required ValueChanged<bool>? onChanged, ...})

Documentation: A Material Design card.
A material design tooltip.
Signature: Tooltip({Key? key, @required String message, Widget? child, ...})
Example Usage: Tooltip(message: 'This is a tooltip', child: Icon(Icons.info))

Documentation: A material design data table.
Signature: DataTable({Key? key, @required List<DataColumn> columns, List<DataRow>? rows, ...})
